thread.title: BRIEF-KVH Industries Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.23

title: BRIEF-KVH Industries Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.23
text:
May 4, 2018 / 11:13 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-KVH Industries Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.23 Reuters Staff
May 4 (Reuters) - KVH Industries Inc: * KVH INDUSTRIES REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS
* Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.06 * Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.23
* Q1 REVENUE $40.1 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $39.4 MILLION
* SEES Q2 NON-GAAP EPS $0.02 - $0.06 * SEES Q2 REVENUE $41.0 MILLION TO $43.0 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EPS $0.12 - $0.28 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $166.0 MILLION TO $180.0 MILLION
* SEES Q2 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE IN RANGE OF $0.08 - $0.13
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE IN RANGE OF $0.21 - $0.44 Source text for Eikon:
